page.title: 05THE VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: We go to{Sir John Moore}School.There are three teachers and 69 children between the ages of 5 and 11. As a pupil I like the school very much There is an infant class,a lower junior class and upper junior class which I am in.The school was built in 1697 and is one of the oldest in Leicestershire. We have very different lessons,Maths, English,Topic (history and geography), Quest(R.E.), Spelling Workshop,Reading Workshop,Art, Music, Games,and Science The main room is the hall.We have assembly and games in there. Near that is the art room where we do art,sewing and pottery.On the other side of the hall is my classroom and the library where we also have{television}and the {computer.}The lower juniors are in a mobile classroom outside and the infants classroom is behind the hall.
